snippet: Long considered the untouchable guardian of a staunchly secular state, the Turkish military has lost its immunity since the pro-Islamic government took power.
abstract: Turkish retired general Cevic Bir and 30 other officers are detained for their roles in 1997 coup, continuing the clash between government and the nation's once-indomitable military.
lead_paragraph: Long considered the untouchable guardian of a staunchly secular state, the Turkish military has lost its immunity since the pro-Islamic government took power.

headline.seo: Turkey Detains Military Leaders for Role in 1997 Coup
headline.main: Turkish Military Leaders Held for Role in ’97 Coup
headline.print_headline: In Turkey, Officers Held In 1997 Coup

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
